metadata.title: CVE-2023-0471 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in WebTransport in Google Chrome prior to 109.0.5414.119allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
